results.title: The efficacy of aspirin and metformin combination therapy in patients with rectal aberrant crypt foci: a double-blinded randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: Then we estimated that the @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@ number would change about - 3 +- 2 (mean +- SD) in the @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ plus placebo group and - 5 +- 2 (mean +- SD) in the @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group based on our previous @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@ prevention trial.

results.title: Metformin suppresses colorectal aberrant crypt foci in a short-term clinical trial.
results.text_hl: We prospectively randomized 26 nondiabetic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@ to treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (250 mg/d, n = 12) or no treatment (control, n = 14); 23 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were evaluable for end point analyses (9 @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and 14 control); the two groups were similar in @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@ number and other baseline clinical characteristics.

Metformin suppresses colorectal aberrant crypt foci in a short-term clinical trial. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2010 Sep;3(9):1077-83. PMID: 20810669

results.title: Metformin efficacy and safety for colorectal polyps: a double-blind randomized controlled trial
results.text_hl: We showed in a previous study that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppressed the formation of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ colorectal @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@.

results.title: Metformin as an antitumor agent in cancer prevention and treatment.
results.text_hl: In addition, a recent clinical trial has shown that short-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces aberrant crypt @DISEASE_Epilepsy_Partial_with_Variable_Foci @DISEASE_MESH:C565785 @@@foci@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@) formation in non-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@.

results.title: Metformin prevents DMH-induced colorectal cancer in diabetic rats by reversing the warburg effect
results.text_hl: The growth and expression of PK and @GENE_IDH1 @GENE_24479 @@@IDH@@@ and activity of HK and @GENE_PDP1 @GENE_54704 @@@PDH@@@ in cell lines @CELLLINE_CVCL:0399 @@@LoVo@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0320 @@@HT-29@@@ were measured after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment. The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly inhibited the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Aberrant_Crypt_Foci</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058739 @@@ACF@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumors@@@.
